actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire a portion of the New Jersey Pinelands if the State of New Jersey acquires other portions of such Pinelands and to reimburse certain New Jersey municipalities for a portion of the property taxes lost as a result of Federal ownership of such land.

summary.text: New Jersey Pinelands Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire approximately 10,000 acres of land in New Jersey to be preserved for public use and enjoyment. Authorizes Federal payments to municipalities for lost property tax revenues as a result of such acquisition.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to acquire a portion of the New Jersey Pinelands if the State of New Jersey acquires other portions of such Pinelands and to reimburse certain New Jersey municipalities for a portion of the property taxes lost as a result of Federal ownership of such land.
